Class.ClassComment: Key2StringMapper /** * Defines the logic of mapping a key object to a String. This is required by certain cache stores, in order to map each key to a String which the underlying store is capable of handling. It should generate a unique String based on the supplied key. * @author Mircea.Markus@jboss.com * @author Manik Surtani */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Do we support this key type? * @param keyType type to test * @return true if the type is supported, false otherwise. */
/** * Must return an unique String for the supplied key. * @param key key to map to a String * @return String representation of the key */
